name: I'm Tired and I Hate It Here
name_original: I'm Tired and I Hate It Here
description:
You’re a part of the most half-assed astronaut team there ever was: the captain of the Mothership was getting his dranks on one day and accidentally opened the hatch that had all your oxygen in it and they went flying into the void. You’re the most (not entirely) sober team member right now so it’s your responsibility to collect those oxygen containers and get back to the ship so you can move on with your team. They’re all tired and hate it here. 

Instructions are included in the .zip file as a PDF document!

Design/Audio/Graphics by me
